item.description:
This is the first film based on the popular trilogy by Suzanne Collins. Set in a future where the Capitol selects a boy and girl from the twelve districts to fight to the death on live television, Katniss Everdeen (Jennifer Lawrence) volunteers to take her younger sister's place for the latest match.

Let's meet at 6:30 for the 7:00 PM show at Solomon Pond Mall. As usual, anyone who wants can join me for dinner after the movie. If you need to reach me, call my cell phone at 508-981-0455.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the lobby. I look like my photo, but with a goatee.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: The Hunger Games
